game.name: Trash Can Tactics
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Someone's been raiding the Nature's Legacy Institute. Not the priceless artifacts. Not the research specimens. The food. Pick your side in this ridiculous turf war: play as raccoons with a plan, or museum staff with a problem, in this asymmetrical PvP heist.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Someone's been raiding the Nature's Legacy Institute. Not the priceless artifacts. Not the research specimens. The food. Pick your side in this ridiculous turf war: play as raccoons with a plan, or museum staff with a problem, in this asymmetrical PvP heist.
